articles.title: U.S. interventions in Latin America and the Caribbean haven't always gone as planned - NPR

articles.title: China's BYD set to overtake Tesla as world's top EV seller - BBC
articles.description: It would mark the first time the Chinese firm has outpaced its American rival for annual sales.
articles.content:
China's BYD is set to overtake Elon Musk's Tesla as the world's biggest seller of electric vehicles (EVs), marking the first time it has outpaced its American rival for annual sales.
